result:
<a-layout class="layout" :class="[device]">

  <template v-if="layoutMode === 'sidemenu'">
    <a-drawer
      v-if="device === 'mobile'"
      :wrapClassName="'drawer-sider ' + navTheme"
      placement="left"
      @close="() => this.collapsed = false"
      :closable="false"
      :visible="collapsed"
      width="200px"
    >
      <side-menu
        mode="inline"
        :menus="menus"
        @menuSelect="menuSelect"
        :theme="navTheme"
        :collapsed="false"
        :collapsible="true"></side-menu>
    </a-drawer>

    <side-menu
      v-else
      mode="inline"
      :menus="menus"
      @menuSelect="myMenuSelect"
      :theme="navTheme"
      :collapsed="collapsed"
      :collapsible="true"></side-menu>
  </template>
  <!-- 下次优化这些代码 -->
  <template v-else>
    <a-drawer
      v-if="device === 'mobile'"
      :wrapClassName="'drawer-sider ' + navTheme"
      placement="left"
      @close="() => this.collapsed = false"
      :closable="false"
      :visible="collapsed"
      width="200px"
    >
      <side-menu
        mode="inline"
        :menus="menus"
        @menuSelect="menuSelect"
        :theme="navTheme"
        :collapsed="false"
        :collapsible="true"></side-menu>
    </a-drawer>
  </template>

  <a-layout
    :class="[layoutMode, `content-width-${contentWidth}`]"
    :style="{ paddingLeft: fixSiderbar && isDesktop() ? `${sidebarOpened ? 200 : 80}px` : '0' }">
    <!-- layout header -->
    <global-header
      :mode="layoutMode"
      :menus="menus"
      :theme="navTheme"
      :collapsed="collapsed"
      :device="device"
      @toggle="toggle"
    />

    <!-- layout content -->
    <a-layout-content :style="{ height: '100%', paddingTop: fixedHeader ? '59px' : '0' }">
      <slot></slot>
    </a-layout-content>

    <!-- layout footer -->
    <a-layout-footer style="padding: 0px">
      <global-footer/>
    </a-layout-footer>
  </a-layout>

  <setting-drawer></setting-drawer>
</a-layout>
